RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEBULOSA was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout and widened late under left handed urging. TIDE RISING chased the winner throughout, could not gain late but held place. DOUGS MORNING PICK tracked three wide and needed more late. PLATE IT UP trailed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 14300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: READY TO MARCH was away alertly cleanly and quickly made the lead, led throughout and widened late while being ridden out. UPTOWN GUY had good position throughout, could not gain late on the winner but was clearly second best THE WILD FLYER was unhurried early, swung wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. PERFECT PICTURE chased the winner for a half, then tired in the lane. CANTANKEROUS BOBBY was allowed to settle and failed to menace. FANELLI raced mid three wide early and was through after a half.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowa nces).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UOTTALIKEIT broke sharply and quickly opened up a clear lead, remained well clear in mid stretch, lasted late under strong handling. MOESTER was allowed to settle early, rallied in the stretch on the rail and closed willingly. GONE IN A FLASH was unhurried early, rallied four wide in the stretch and closed a gap. ELLIOT THE DRAGON chased the winner throughout and went evenly late. KEEPING SCORE was allowed to settle early, dropped to the rail in the stretch and was no threat. TEAM LEYENDECKER raced mid pack early and was no menace.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 27500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $25,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Sin ce December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IRISH UNITY dueled on the front end for a half on the rail, shook clear in the stretch, driving. SAINT GOAR was allowed to settle early, rallied in the stretch five wide, finished well and was second best. COMPLY raced mid pack, had a mild bid late while no threat. DAVID'S GEM tracked three wide and lacked a late response. GOOD ON YA dueled with the winner and weakened in mid stretch. ALACRITOUS saved ground and tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAUREENLOVESFRANK tracked three wide early rallied at the quarter pole and drew even, edged clear late after a long battle under strong handling. POLISHED GEM dueled on the lead throughout, held grudgingly after a long battle and just missed. INDY PRINCESS KOKO was allowed to settle early, rallied in the stretch five wide and finished well to be gaining. LIBERTY BELLE had good position, on the inside and went evenly late. BOX STEP raced close up throughout and weakened slightly late. ALL AMERICAN JEWEL raced mid pack, rallied in the stretch on the rail, put in her bid, then hung. CATABOUT raced wide and was no menace. DESTINY'S DARLING contended early while between horses and was through after a half. CURT'S ANGEL was squeezed at the start and trailed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 21600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 25. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROLLIN ALL THE WAY dueled on the lead for a half from the rail, shook clear in the stretch and widened late while being ridden out. HIGHLY EXPLOSIVE had good position on the inside, was no match for winner late but was second best. BOOGIE BOOGEE dueled with the winner for a half and gradually weakened. GAIL'S DANCER raced mid pack early, swung five wide in the stretch and was no menace late. GRIZABELLA allowed to settle, saved ground and was no threat. BISCAYNE BAY contended early three wide and was through after a half. NORTHERN JOURNEY was no factor. PENNY SHOTS trailed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 20400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RADIANTRITHYM tracked four wide, lost ground on the turn, rallied five wide in the stretch, had a late burst and was along in time. LOADED ONCE MORE had good position throughout, rallied in the stretch four wide, finished well and just missed. FLASH TOWN was never far back on the inside, rallied in the stretch on the rail, led between calls late and just missed. BAREBACK FUN dueled on the lead until mid stretch, then weakened slightly. BACKSPLASH was unhurried early on the inside, angled out four wide in the stretch and was no threat. AUNT STELLA pressed the pace until mid stretch and weakened late. TAPALONG raced mid pack early and was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowan ces) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIND YOUR OWN dueled on the early lead, shook clear in the stretch, prevailed late under left handed urging. YEARS AGO pressed the pace throughout, finished willingly three wide and just missed. PURDY PUMKIN was unhurried early, rallied in the stretch on the rail and closed willingly. CALTHA raced mid pack early rallied in the stretch, was in tight late while between horses and went evenly late. GRAY ROYALITY contended on the inside and lacked a late response. SKY allowed to settle, failed to menace. ROSE KNOWS was outrun. MIMI'S GOLDEN RING tracked four wide and was through after a half. The stewards posted the inquiry sign but took no action.
